title: Stoicism

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose a player to make Stoic for the night. The effects of any abilities that happen to them instead do not happen, and are queued for the next night. Three uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, all players who attempt to visit you are silently redirected to themselves instead. This surpasses immunities.
- Stoic players can only ignore things that affect them (ie: roleblock, attacked, poisoned, blackmailed). They cannot ignore things out of their control, such as having their visitors redirected from them, or being investigated.
- If you make a good player Stoic, they also are blackmailed at the start of the day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 5152
*Ignore pain. Control your nerves. React in ways you want.*
